item.title: British Rule in South Africa. Illustrated in the Story of Kama and His Tribe, and of the War in Zululand
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book British Rule in South Africa. Illustrated in the Story of Kama and His Tribe, and of the War in Zululand by Holden, W C. London : Published for the Author at the Wesleyan Conference Office, 2, Castle-Street, City-Road; And 66, Paternoster-Row., (Hayman Brothers and Lilly, Printers, Hatton House, Farringdon Road, London, E.C, 1879.]
